title: You don’t say
author: VD
content_html:
I have to confess, I found this headline about the recent speech by the head of the International Monetary Fund to be mildly amusing.

“‘A return to the Great Depression‘: IMF boss ramps up pressure on EU with gloomy new recession warning”

Pity she didn’t read RGD back in the autumn of 2009.
